extendedInfo.description: GNews Plus is a great Google news app to let you easily read, share and manage world news in Google News. Quickly switch to the news edition of a different country, and save your favorite edition to the favorites for next time use. Mobile mobile setting provides to use Google mobile transfer function to transfer web page from desktop version to mobile version on the fly.Sharing is the most important when reading some interesting news and you  maybe want to share with your friends. Here, you can easily share news by popular social tools like Twitter, Facebook, and others.Auto Detect can auto detect news edition for your location.Please enjoy this app to let you read top news over the world, and advise if any suggestions.Features:1. Google Regional News Selection2. Auto detect news edition for user location3. Favorites to save what regional news edition you like4. Share news by social tools5. Real-time mobile page transfer (setting)

reviews.title: Starting to Suck!!!
reviews.comment: Now the stupid ads pop up and take up the entire page and when I tap on the x to make it go away, it doesn\'t...  Sick of it....
reviews.author: Cheryl A.L.

reviews.title: Terrible interface, very buggy.
reviews.comment: For some reason, you only have about a 50% chance of getting the article you select. The other half it sends you to whatever headline they have selected. You can\'t exit with the back button, and the exit option is buried at the bottom of the \'more\' menu item.   Overall an unpleasant experience. I find myself waiting until I get to my PC rather than having to deal with this extremely buggy app.
reviews.author: Dan Martin

reviews.title: Not good for travel
reviews.comment: Changes languages as you change countries. Stay home or find something else.
reviews.author: Ralph Merry

reviews.title: Great news app
reviews.comment: The app is customizable for specific search terms ... Just what I was looking for.
reviews.author: Jos\303\251 G. P\303\251rez

reviews.title: Barely Updates
reviews.comment: Only updates every 2nd or 3rd day. Unless the news is current, the app is pretty well useless.
reviews.author: Barry Davidson

reviews.title: Handy
reviews.comment: Brilliant being able to browse international news.  Would be good if it had a translator.  The little button blocking view is annoying, hide it in the interface.

reviews.title: G News plus
reviews.comment: Though I usually have high praise for Google apps, this one not so much. It needs to be formatted like the Huff and CNN where you can choose your categories and slide to the next category.  I do like however how you can crossreference with the web.. Three stars keep upgrading.
